title: Digital RP Cards
body: So, I have a 50 dollar gift card to gamestop. I basically only play this game so I Was wondering, could I buy a 50 dollar RP thing and then use it without it having to actually be physically with me? Like buy a code from gamestop.

replies.body: Most gamestops have League gift cards (at least in my area also in NA). I beleive gamestop's website also has them listed, and they should be able to have it mailed to you as well.

I'm not sure about which regions specifically sells digital copy cards except for Amazon.  Per our [RP Card](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753224-Prepaid-RP-Cards-NA-OCE-) guide, you can find digital codes on [Amazon's RP page](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B014X427WM?gwSec=1&ref_=br_imp).  Keep in mind that this is currently available in NA, and I'd also be wary about any other venues that might claim to have digital codes as I couldn't confirm it's validity.  Hope that helps!
